venue.name: Will send when you sign up

item.description:
Hi, are you getting stressed yet?  Let's talk about how we can stay focused and positive and enjoy the journey through this holiday season.  Let's make it the best and most joyest season ever!  Come be with like minded people to keep you on the right track:) We'll watch a (related) part of a movie to help motivate our discussion. Have a wonderful Thanksgiving and look forward to seeing you soon!---Caryn

 

PS.  There will be a slight charge to help offset costs.
item.how_to_find_us: Same place in Scarborough we always meet and if you're new we'll send address.
item.name: Let's enjoy and stay positive for the holidays!
